message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - com.ciandt.techgallery.persistence.model.*.
Import statement for 'com.googlecode.objectify.Objectify' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'SPECIAL_IMPORTS' group, expecting group 'STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE' on this line.
Import statement for 'com.googlecode.objectify.ObjectifyFactory' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'SPECIAL_IMPORTS' group, expecting group 'STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE' on this line.
Import statement for 'com.googlecode.objectify.ObjectifyService' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'SPECIAL_IMPORTS' group, expecting group 'STANDARD_JAVA_PACKAGE' on this line.
'com.ciandt.techgallery.persistence.model.profile.UserProfile' should be separated from previous import group by one line.
